page.title: 17TOURISM
page.content: The Skipsea area is popular in summer for holiday makers.Many people from the West Riding have caravans on one of the camps around here.The biggest camp is the Far Grange camp owned by the McCanns.It holds statics and has room for touring vans.To attract the visitors,the camp has a number of attractions such as a clubhouse,a shop,a games room and an arcade.The sands at Skipsea are not as wide as in Bridlington Bay.The people who stay in the caravans often drive off for the day to places of interest around, such as Bridlington.Some people go out on the sea on boats or inflatables.During the summer months,the roads are very busy with many more cars. Lots of people drive through on their way to look around Hornsea Pottery. Withernsea is also popular,especially on the market days. by Sam and Adrian.
